auth.welcomeSubtitle: Your smart personal finance assistant for a clearer financial future.

success.registration: Registration successful! Please proceed with onboarding.

biometrics.title: Quick & Secure Login
biometrics.description: Use your fingerprint or face recognition to log in quickly and securely. This keeps your financial data safe and easily accessible.
biometrics.noHardware: Biometric hardware not available on this device.
biometrics.notEnrolledMessage: You haven't set up biometrics on your device. Please enable it in your device settings first.
biometrics.errorSetup: Could not set up biometric login. Please try again later.

auth.statementProcessingSubtitle: This may take a few moments. Please wait...
auth.statementProcessingStatusFailed: An error occurred while processing statement {fileName}. Please try again or contact support.
auth.onboardingCompleteSubtitle: Congratulations! You're all set to take control of your finances with ClariFi.
auth.bankSelectionNoResults: No banks found matching your search.
auth.statementInstructionsIntro: Follow these steps to prepare your bank statements for import:
auth.statementInstructionsStep1Description: Log in to your online banking portal and locate the section for e-statements or documents. They are usually available in PDF format.
auth.statementInstructionsStep2Description: Download up to 6 months of your most recent bank statements. Ensure they are official documents, not summaries.
auth.statementInstructionsStep3Description: We currently support PDF and CSV files. Make sure your downloaded files are in one of these formats.
auth.statementInstructionsTip: Tip: Having statements from all your accounts for the same period provides the best financial overview.
auth.statementCaptureSubtitle: Select PDF or CSV files from your device.

bankSelection.title: Select Your Bank(s)
bankSelection.description: Choose the financial institutions you bank with. This helps us prepare for your statement imports.
bankSelection.noResults: No banks found. Try a different search.

statementInstructions.title: Importing Your Statements
statementInstructions.intro: To get started, you'll need to download your bank statements. Here's how:
statementInstructions.step1Description: Visit your bank's official website or open their mobile app and log in to your online banking portal.
statementInstructions.step2Description: Look for a section like 'e-Statements', 'Documents', or 'Account Activity'. Download your statements, preferably as PDF files. Monthly statements for the last 6-12 months are ideal.
statementInstructions.step3Description: Save the downloaded files to a place on your device where you can easily find them for the next step.
statementInstructions.tip: Tip: Ensure your statements are clear and legible. We currently best support PDF formats.

statementCapture.title: Upload Your Statements
statementCapture.description: Select the statement files (PDF or CSV) you downloaded from your bank. You can select multiple files.
statementCapture.noFilesYet: No files selected yet. Tap above to choose your statements.
statementCapture.errorPicking: Could not select files. Please try again.
statementCapture.noFilesError: Please select at least one statement file to continue.
statementCapture.uploadSuccessPlaceholder: Files uploaded successfully! We'll start processing them.

settings.selectLanguage: Select your preferred language for education content

calculators.title: Financial Calculators
calculators.description: Use these interactive tools to make informed financial decisions

tip.title: Pro Tip
tip.text: Save your calculations to track your progress over time. Each calculator includes helpful tips and Canadian-specific information.

budget.title: Budget Calculator
budget.description: Create a personalized budget based on your income and expenses

savingsGoal.title: Savings Goal
savingsGoal.description: Plan how much to save monthly to reach your financial goals

creditUtilization.title: Credit Utilization
creditUtilization.description: Calculate and optimize your credit card utilization ratio

mortgage.title: Mortgage Calculator
mortgage.description: Estimate monthly payments and total interest for home loans

compoundInterest.title: Compound Interest
compoundInterest.description: See how your investments can grow over time with compound interest
